thread.title: New York City Mayor Seeks Spending Increase

author: Kate King
title: New York City Mayor Seeks Spending Increase

locations.name: new york city mayor seeks spending increase new york city

text:
New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio presented an $89.06 billion executive budget proposal Thursday, representing a spending increase of nearly $4 billion that the mayor said he is confident the city can afford.
The plan would raise spending about 4.5% over this yearâ€™s adopted $85.24 billion budget. Labor, debt service and education spending are driving most of the increase, with the proposed budget adding an estimated 1,700 city jobs, city officials said.
